Hotel_Name: Best Western Plus Hotel Felice Casati
Negative_Review: Rooms did not really feel too comfy but good enough to sleep Maybe I am being picky everything was fine given the price This was a good option for a low price close to the city center If you require modern extra comfy hotel pay a premium and choose some other hotels in 4 star category or just go for 5 stars
Positive_Review: Staff were great breakfast not bad given the price location of the hotel is quite good wifi worked well if you hire a car there are a number of car parks within walking distance at Central station

Hotel_Name: Best Western Plus Hotel Felice Casati
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: The people at the reception where very friendly and ready to help the breakfast was nice the bed very comfortable the room really clean overall everything was fantastic

Hotel_Name: Best Western Plus Hotel Felice Casati
Negative_Review: The booking was prepaid so our entire stay was already paid weeks earlier than we arrived Upon arrival I was asked to present the credit card I used for the booking That means the exact same physical credit card When checking in I expect to have to give a credit card in case of extra expenses during the stay so I gave them the one I had with me However it appeared to be a problem that it was not the precise one used for the booking I don t understand this I travelled to Best Western hotels in Japan China USA Germany and more and it never ever happened that people cared about having the exact same card I did the booking with I could somehow understand it if I had only secured the booking and still had to pay on checkout but here it was even prepaid I finally managed to retrieve my credit card bill in which the booking transaction appeared because fortunately I had gotten it a few days earlier and it was easily accessible online and this did the trick I still don t get why it was needed I am ready to accept that it is required for some reasons I don t know but asking for the precise card used for the booking is highly non standard even more when prepaid so it should at least be clearly indicated somewhere I checked the booking confirmation sheet and this requirement appears nowhere What if I was travelling on a business trip and my stay was paid with my company credit card I would not have had easily access to any bill and would not have had the credit with me either The minimum thing to do would thus be to indicate this requirement in huge bold letters in the hotel description or the confirmation The future travellers owning more than one credit card and not always going around with all of them will be grateful
Positive_Review: The hotel is extremely well located and very cozy Rooms are a bit small but very comfy It is the perfect place for a holiday weekend in the city

Hotel_Name: Best Western Plus Hotel Felice Casati
Negative_Review: We received a very small room it was hard to turn around however not all the rooms are that small so when you book just ask for a more spacious one
Positive_Review: We liked everything Very nice and helpful staff Very beautiful location we stayed in other areas of the city center and this was the best one Very nice and beautiful hotel

Hotel_Name: Best Western Plus Hotel Felice Casati
Negative_Review: Our shower door was dodgy but that got fixed pretty quickly
Positive_Review: It was quiet had great staff a convenient location and the cheapest full breakfast 5 Euro head we had during our 3 week trip

Hotel_Name: Best Western Plus Hotel Felice Casati
Negative_Review: As is always the case with rooms in city centres they can be on the small side
Positive_Review: The hotel is a good location and in a quiet back street it is very clean and the staff are always very kind and polite as a bonus they speak good English There are some nice local bar cafes to eat at and it is a short walk from the Metro The rooms are always clean and well equipped

Hotel_Name: Best Western Plus Hotel Felice Casati
Negative_Review: Breakfast was a little bit poor not sure if because was sunday but there was no fresh bread available just some bread slices to toast
Positive_Review: location was nice I wanted a hotel in that area room was clean and comfortable small bathroom though

Hotel_Name: Best Western Plus Hotel Felice Casati
Negative_Review: The staff was rude and arrogant
Positive_Review: Pathetic and rude staff at the reception We reached in lat in the night and the staff was rude and arrogant and not cooperating at all

Hotel_Name: Best Western Plus Hotel Felice Casati
Negative_Review: The bathroom had a not very pleasant smell right after I entered the room but after sometime after keeping the ventilation on it went away It was very clean though Everything else was great
Positive_Review: I originally booked a regular single bed but received a room with a big double bad which was a very nice surprise Thank you The breakfast was nice and the staff was very friendly

Hotel_Name: Best Western Plus Hotel Felice Casati
Negative_Review: The 2 construction buildings next door to the hotel creating all the noise so early in the morning and the rooms not getting cleaned for one of the days
Positive_Review: The cleanliness of the hotel and room about 2km out from the duomo fast speed wifi in the rooms and the little gym to keep fit if you wanted

Hotel_Name: Best Western Plus Hotel Felice Casati
Negative_Review: Not in walking distance to city center Somewhat expensive
Positive_Review: Quiet place walk distance from Milano Centrale Excellent rooms although there was a stale smell in one of our three rooms Very good breakfast

Hotel_Name: Best Western Plus Hotel Felice Casati
Negative_Review: The shower in my room is perfect for an eight year old under weight child not for an average sized adult male
Positive_Review: Room kept very clean tidy Breakfast is very good

Hotel_Name: Best Western Plus Hotel Felice Casati
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: Very beautiful and spacious room with antique furniture Terrase on the roof has a breathtaking view I would definetely stay there next time in Vicenza

Hotel_Name: Best Western Plus Hotel Felice Casati
Negative_Review: Smelly corridors and elevators Small room decent bathroom but tiny shower As in most hotels in my experience staff seems to change all towels no matter where you leave them save our planet make a difference etc
Positive_Review: Great location Cheap acceptable breakfast but lacks local food and quality For 10 EUR for two you can grab some better cold cuts mozarrella tomatoes and bread in a Carrefour Express nearby

Hotel_Name: Best Western Plus Hotel Felice Casati
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: The cheapest breakfast I have had in hotels 5 euros and a good one too several warm options lost of pastry several jogurts etc The location is right in the middle between Central station and Buenos Aires street shopping 10 minutes each way great for the weekend trip The area is not the most fancy one but it has lots of restaurants carrefour around the corner several coffee places The rooms are a bit smallish but it was okay Staff is super friendly and helpful

Hotel_Name: Best Western Plus Hotel Felice Casati
Negative_Review: Might be not safe to walk around at night considering the amount of young africans wandering nearby No heating in the bath Tiny shower cabin Building is under construction right in front of the hotel so you won t need the alarm clock definitely Also overall sound insulation in the room is bellow average
Positive_Review: Location is quite satisfactory all the famous places can be reached by foot in about 25min Nice looking tasteful classic interior Friendly helpful staff Clean room housekeepers seem so be doing their job really well Wireless internet at 40Mbs fast

Hotel_Name: Best Western Plus Hotel Felice Casati
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: The management was so courteous n helpful loved there hospitality the free savouries were awwwwsum the management was simply amazing they helped us in every way especially don remem his name on his badge trainee was writen he was a amazing person love u guys god bless u

Hotel_Name: Best Western Plus Hotel Felice Casati
Negative_Review: City taxes and paying separately from the breakfast Hotel was great
Positive_Review: Very good breakfast although it was a bit surprise it was not included in the booking com price Gym is small but you have some gear there Missing the dumbbells Staff was very polite and helped with all possible questions we had Rooms were very clean and comfy

Hotel_Name: Best Western Plus Hotel Felice Casati
Negative_Review: It was really hard to find fault with this hotel everything was great apart from the room was very warm so we turned on the the air con but had to switch it off after a short time as it gave off an awful smell We slept with the window open but the noise from the street trams cars mopeds outside kept us awake
Positive_Review: We stayed for two nights in this lovely hotel Fast friendly check in very helpful receptionist Room was very comfortable clean and well equipped There was a kettle and complimentary tea and coffee provided a mini bar which we didn t use hairdryer and mirrors placed near to socket points Inthe lobby there was tea biscuits and fruit and breakfast was served from 7am and after our week travelling around Italy and staying in various hotels the selection was by far the best on a buffet that we have received There was a choice of cereals croissants with different fillings cake bread bread rolls jams bacon egg rice or cous cous cold meats cheese Fresh orange juice fruit and yoghurt The coffee was freely available from a machine and was very tasty with a good choice There was also a free gym at the hotel which unfortunately we didn t have time to use

Hotel_Name: Best Western Plus Hotel Felice Casati
Negative_Review: Noise from the hall woke up each time someone leaves their rooms Also there was this awful deodorant they use for room cleaning really annoyed me
Positive_Review: No Positive

Hotel_Name: Best Western Plus Hotel Felice Casati
Negative_Review: Nothing
Positive_Review: The location is wonderful Not far from the station and in a quiet neighbourhood The hotel is very neat and has a good appearance should you have the need to receive some business contacts in the lobby

Hotel_Name: Best Western Plus Hotel Felice Casati
Negative_Review: Rooms were quite noisy hot water in the shower took quite a well to heat up Air conditioning not working
Positive_Review: Great location near Milan Centrale and walkable distance to the Duomo and other attractions Bed was comfortable Friendly staff

Hotel_Name: Best Western Plus Hotel Felice Casati
Negative_Review: The wifi connection and system is a bit whimsical during the first login of each day but it eventually works fine is free and allows the connection of as many devices as you wish

Hotel_Name: Best Western Plus Hotel Felice Casati
Negative_Review: Room could be bigger Walls are thin and you can hear people from the rooms next to you The overall temperature in the hotel and room are quite high

Hotel_Name: Best Western Plus Hotel Felice Casati
Negative_Review: If you have sleeping problems think about it twice as the walls are very thin I couldn t sleep one of the nights because people were just having a chat next room without being loud

Hotel_Name: Best Western Plus Hotel Felice Casati
Negative_Review: Unfortunately very thin walls I had two different rooms and the first night I could hear the neighbour snore the second night there were drunken women in the other room I don t recommend for people who cannot sleep with noise
Positive_Review: Nice building room quite modern Water cooker in the room Quite ok breakfast in Italian starndards 5

Hotel_Name: Best Western Plus Hotel Felice Casati
Negative_Review: Bigger bed
Positive_Review: The rooms look good they are really clean but our room was pretty small which was not the big problem but the bed was really small Breakfast is alright

Hotel_Name: Best Western Plus Hotel Felice Casati
Negative_Review: Breakfast is modest and cost 5 Euro the hotel is about 25 minutes walk form the center its NOT 700 M from the central station had to take a cab which cost about 10 Euro Room was SMALL
Positive_Review: Great Hotel friendly staff and always happy to help with anything nice functional and great value for money will def stay again if needed

Hotel_Name: Best Western Plus Hotel Felice Casati
Negative_Review: Room stuffy and far to hot Unable to control temperature other than open the window which made it noisy Did not sleep well at all Dinner was not good and i did not eat the main course and refused to pay Far better quality outside the hotel for the same price Staff at dinner were not friendly
Positive_Review: Check in efficient and staff friendly and helpful Breakfast very good value and staff polite Public area near reception was very comfortable and pleasant

Hotel_Name: Best Western Plus Hotel Felice Casati
Negative_Review: We arrived very late at night and we walked around the neighborhood a bit because the hotel sign was so small that we could not see it from the main road There are a few Best Western Hotels in the neighbourhood so be careful with the name when you ask for directions Our wifi did not work and we had no map so we went round in circles a bit But later in the day we found that it was not difficult to access from the train station Plenty of Indian and Chinese restaurants and just 5 mins from one of the biggest shopping centers
Positive_Review: Clean and modern facilities Not far from Milano Centrale by walk

Hotel_Name: Best Western Plus Hotel Felice Casati
Negative_Review: Not enough hot food at breakfast
Positive_Review: Great location very comfortable rooms nice and warm Good shower Really helpful reception desk and staff It was my girlfriend s birthday and we received complementary cake and prosecco They also helped with booking a restaurant Good breakfast great coffee

Hotel_Name: Best Western Plus Hotel Felice Casati
Negative_Review: This is our 3rd stay at this hotel but it was for the first time that I ve noticed how thin the wall to the neighbour room is we could easily hear our daughter chatting and laughing with her friend Probably it depends of the room because as I said before I haven t noticed this
Positive_Review: During our visits to Milan we ve always stayed at this hotel and we don t see any reason to change it Reasons very polite and helpful staff perfect location only 20 min walking distance to the Duomo and just a small distance to the main shopping street Buenos Aires very good breakfast including huge variety of fresh baked sweets eggs bacon bread salami etc small but clean and comfortable rooms very good wi fi comfortable bed In addition on the lobby there are coffee tea sweets and apples that you can take

Hotel_Name: Best Western Plus Hotel Felice Casati
Negative_Review: The bed room in general was a little small but definitely a good value for the price

Hotel_Name: Best Western Plus Hotel Felice Casati

Hotel_Name: Best Western Plus Hotel Felice Casati

Hotel_Name: Best Western Plus Hotel Felice Casati

Hotel_Name: Best Western Plus Hotel Felice Casati

Hotel_Name: Best Western Plus Hotel Felice Casati
Negative_Review: Nothing considering a hotel General Milano Be very careful with choosing travel agency for services Agency might look professional but they hire a very bad guides so just pay attention because you can stay somewhere cos he do not wait for passengers We know Italian and there was not a problem for us but without knowing it just must pay attention a lot
Positive_Review: This hotel is absolutely fantastic and clean place with so helpful and welcoming stuff Mrs Monica welcomed us and at the start she explained to us almost everything we need for a directions and transport Atmosphere is like you are at home Rooms are clean tidy and cozy Everything you might need you have there even Coffee maker to make a coffee or tea In front of lift in a very nice decorated atrium there are machines for making hot drinks with so wonderful and delicious biscuits hard to stop eating them Breakfast is very diversified and fantastic too and all services in general are great It is very close to Milan central station where you can take a train to all directions you need City center is 5 or 6 stops by tram number 1 just 2 minutes walk from hotel My sister friends and I love Italy a lot and every year two or three times we visit different or same cities but this hotel is ABSOLUTELY THE BEST experience in whole Italy Highly recommend and I hope so I will back there soon p s Thank you we spent wonderful 5 days

Hotel_Name: Best Western Plus Hotel Felice Casati

Hotel_Name: Best Western Plus Hotel Felice Casati

Hotel_Name: Best Western Plus Hotel Felice Casati

Positive_Review: The location suits us well midway between the Station and the Duomo The hotel has a nice atmosphere

Hotel_Name: Best Western Plus Hotel Felice Casati
Negative_Review: 1 How good they are cleaning room I knew by finding someone s sneakers under my bed no comments 2 The second day after a long trip I wanted to have some drinks and snacks in my room from the bar but the bar wasn t working in working hours The woman at the reception told me by phone that I can go to a pizza next to hotel to order a takeaway and then eat it in the room This is 4 stars hotel I think that it wasn t so hard to offer me a help with ordering to my room 3 You don t have a bathrobe in you room and no slippers but from the papers in the room you can find that you can ask them for bathrobes No information about slippers but if you will ask both they will help you You need to ask for such things in 4 stars
Positive_Review: Good location 15 min to Milano Centrale

Hotel_Name: Best Western Plus Hotel Felice Casati
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: Our room was lovely with a balcony and plants The room was pleasant clean and well equipped The ambience of the hotel was elegant and welcoming and the breakfast was great The staff were exceptionally helpful and friendly

Hotel_Name: Best Western Plus Hotel Felice Casati
Negative_Review: The location can be quite confusing as it is not nearby any train or tram station Thankfully the hotel overall service was considered satisfactory
Positive_Review: The single room at level 3 is clean quiet and comfortable What I like is the breakfast spread with quality delicacies

Hotel_Name: Best Western Plus Hotel Felice Casati
Negative_Review: Na
Positive_Review: Geat customer care service with helpful Receptionists provide travel guide to first timer Always cheerful and smiling that s brighten my day in Milan

Hotel_Name: Best Western Plus Hotel Felice Casati

Hotel_Name: Best Western Plus Hotel Felice Casati
Negative_Review: All excellent
Positive_Review: Very good bathroom and lovely shower not to be taken for granted in Italy very helpful staff spotlessly clean throughout Comfortable conservatory to relax in Gluten free breads and biscuits for breakfast and free pastries and fruit in the lounge Close to trams which we used a lot

Hotel_Name: Best Western Plus Hotel Felice Casati
Negative_Review: There was a little bit too hot in the room and no other options to make it cooler rather than opening window Some noise can be heard from other rooms and corridors The room was a bit too small for a full comfort of our stay
Positive_Review: Huge and delicious breakfast Really great hotel location easily reachable from central station Shopping area many restaurants and cafes around Friendly staff as well City center can be reached in 15 20 min by walk

Hotel_Name: Best Western Plus Hotel Felice Casati
Negative_Review: There s no parking at the hotel if you are travelling by car you have to leave it on the street which might be problematic but if you re not coming by car as we did then it s not a problem
Positive_Review: Staff was very polite and helpful perfect location close to one of the main shopping streets Buenos Aires close to the Duomo approximately 20 min walking close to the Central railway station nice and clean rooms free wi fi with a good speed for breakfast there were many things for every taste in the afternoon in the lobby there was free tea coffee available plus fruits and sweets For sure we ll stay at the same hotel next time we are in Milan

Hotel_Name: Best Western Plus Hotel Felice Casati
Negative_Review: The service at the reception quite disappointing for a hotel of this chain They recommended us to use the parking external seems to be a different company they have an agreement with because it can be dangerous at night and something can get broken This does not say anything nice about the location actually coming from them What this receptionist Andrea didn t tell us was that there was a marathon in the city and we wouldn t be able to pick up the car between 8 30 and 3 as the street where the parking is we did not even see the parking as they parked the car would not be accessible We only learnt about this from the receptionist when we got back to the hotel at midnight He was very nice with us and did his best to solve the issue However the one at the reception the previous evening surely knew about the marathon in the city right They took out the car and parked it early in the morning in a street that we could have access to We paid 25 euros for a parking for 24h that we barely used and when we mentioned this upon check out they said you used the parking Thank you for being more interested in making us pay than making us comfortable
Positive_Review: The breakfast was the best thing

Hotel_Name: Best Western Plus Hotel Felice Casati
Negative_Review: Soundproofing is not good enough I could hear people loudly talking in the neighboring rooms and walking in the corridor
Positive_Review: Comfortable bed Spacious bathroom Good breakfast Overall nicely decorated and very clean room

Hotel_Name: Best Western Plus Hotel Felice Casati
Negative_Review: The breakfast especially the orange juice which tastes somewhat chemical could be better but then again breakfasts are rarely great in Italy Italians are generally happy with a spartan coffee pastry or just coffee
Positive_Review: Good location really comfortable beds good value for money if you don t want to overspend on hotels in the historic core

Hotel_Name: Best Western Plus Hotel Felice Casati
Negative_Review: Time estimates are ambitious It s is at least 30 35 mins walk to town centre and 30mins from central station Single room is tiny Double bed and not much else Didn t impact upon excellent stay
Positive_Review: Good location very near shops Walkable just to town centre Good local area Lots of nice local restaurants Safe for lone female traveller Clean Warm Hot shower Adequate breakfast Helpful staff bi lingual Free newspapers and snacks

Hotel_Name: Best Western Plus Hotel Felice Casati
Negative_Review: nothing
Positive_Review: I arrived at 10 30am and the hotel already had my room ready They had a gym which was a bonus for the price of the hotel Very good value for money all around Evening snack bar was a nice touch too Quite centrally located within easy reach of most of Milan s popular districts

Hotel_Name: Best Western Plus Hotel Felice Casati
Negative_Review: average breakfast off season rooms on the small simple side including upgraded ones wifi gets overloaded fast
Positive_Review: great location close to shopping district and good restaurants clean rooms

Hotel_Name: Best Western Plus Hotel Felice Casati
Negative_Review: The room seemed a bit packed but it was comfy and clean
Positive_Review: Excellent location next to Buenos Aires district for shopping and also well connected to the centre and Centrale via public transport Large variety of breakfast choices and the gym on ground floor were a plus too

Hotel_Name: Best Western Plus Hotel Felice Casati
Negative_Review: we could hear the other rooms noises
Positive_Review: Every thing was fine location is perfect it is only 5 mints from poines airs street and almost the same to the central station 3 stops to the duomo

Hotel_Name: Best Western Plus Hotel Felice Casati
Negative_Review: The staff room was great and loved how clean the hotel was
Positive_Review: I would let all my friends know how wonderful your hotel staff was The room was all that more Thanks so much

Hotel_Name: Best Western Plus Hotel Felice Casati
Negative_Review: The room was very small considering that when I was booking I made a choice to pay a little extra for a bigger room
Positive_Review: The hotel has a great location and the staff were very helpful It s also very clean

Hotel_Name: Best Western Plus Hotel Felice Casati
Negative_Review: Room is very small very hot and without air Bathroom is very small two people cannot stay together Furniture is old if you do not expect anything from room you can go because of breakfast
Positive_Review: Breakfast is very good

Hotel_Name: Best Western Plus Hotel Felice Casati
Negative_Review: We had an early flight and landed in Milan at 8AM Hotel check in at 2 understood When I booked the room I mentioned early check in and the hotel made no effort to get us in before 2pm We had a tour at 2 30 pm so we had no access to a hotel room from 9AM until 6pm after our tour It was unpleasant We called at noon to see if there was a chance to have access earlier no 2pm Also the room was very small only room to sleep
Positive_Review: Clean breakfast was good friendly staff enjoyed courtyard

Hotel_Name: Best Western Plus Hotel Felice Casati
Negative_Review: The shower was on the small side
Positive_Review: We have stayed in this hotel many times and this time the room we had was larger than normal and as always everything was very clean

Hotel_Name: Best Western Plus Hotel Felice Casati
Negative_Review: I liked the hotel but the rooms are really cramped I stayed in a luxury room and it was tiny but nice and cosy
Positive_Review: I thought the staff was excellent and very polite The location is good as well 10mins walk from central station and also a 10mins walk to Lima

Hotel_Name: Best Western Plus Hotel Felice Casati
Negative_Review: Nothing except that there was a shower in the room not a bathtub but it s not really a problem
Positive_Review: The staff are very awesome they allowed us to check in 2 hours earlier and asked us if we wanted to leave our luggage after checkout so enjoy our last day They even offered us the drinks we consumed from the mini bar They managed to make a queen size bed for us upon our arrival and recommended to us what to do in the the city and how to get to places The breakfast is very generous and there are lots of varieties I definitely recommend it They offer free bikes as well for their consumers Thank you Deborah

Hotel_Name: Best Western Plus Hotel Felice Casati
Negative_Review: Not enough tables seats for breakfast Bit small room and toilet
Positive_Review: Very fresh room Nice location close to couple of restaurants and 15min walk to city centre Good value for money

Hotel_Name: Best Western Plus Hotel Felice Casati
Negative_Review: Disappointment was the fact that we booked the bigger and more expensive Standard double room 15 m2 as advertised by booking com but we were still given the tiny cheaper Economy room 12 m2 where there was hardly any space to move around the receptionist explained that all rooms are of the same size and no other rooms were available so waste of money
Positive_Review: Location was fine close to metro corso Buenos Aires central station

Hotel_Name: Best Western Plus Hotel Felice Casati
Negative_Review: Room was a little small but not an issue
Positive_Review: Breakfast was excellent location was perfect close to Central station 10 mins walk and 10 mins to underground Bed very comfortable had no problem sleeping
